dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2448 IS: Health Care Fairness for Military Families Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kelly (for himself, Ms. Murkowski, and Ms. Warren) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to improve dependent coverage under the TRICARE Young Adult Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Health Care Fairness for Military Families Act of 2025.

section.header: Improvements to dependent coverage under TRICARE Young Adult Program

subsection.text: Subsection (b) of section 1110b of title 10, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (4) and (5) as paragraphs (3) and (4), respectively.

subsection.header: Elimination of separate premium for a young adult
subsection.text: Such section is further amended by striking subsection (c).
Section 1075(c)(3) of such title is amended by striking section 1076d, 1076e, or 1110b and inserting section 1076d or 1076e.
